mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_friend WHERE username=#{0} and friend_name=#{1};
mapper.select: select friend_name from user_friend where is_friend = "0" and coalesce(is_accept,0) != "1" and username = #{0} and friend_name not in ( select friend_name from user_friend where username = #{0} and is_accept = "1" union all select friend_name from user_friend where username = #{0} and is_accept = "0" ) order by user_create_time desc

select #{0} as username ,u.username as friend_name
from user u where u.username not in ( select friend_name
from user_friend where username = #{0} group by friend_name ) group by u.username

select username ,friend_name
from user_friend where username = #{0} group by username ,friend_name
